name: QR Maker
description: QR Maker app (QR Creator) - Helps you create a QR code or scan a QR code. Create QR codes with one click. Save the QR code to your device. Change the color and size of the QR code. Scan any QR code and follow the links.  QR code creator and reader: Create your own QR codes, change the color of QR code, share QR code. The application generates text or a link on a QR code, with the ability to save QR code.  Scan QR codes through this app: Thanks to the built-in QR code scanner - you can open sites or decode text.  Features of the application:  - Quick QR code maker (Create a QR code with one touch) - QR code creator and scanner (Built-in QR Code Scanner) - QR code maker free (The application is free without Built-in purchases) - QR maker and scanner with functionality (Change the size and color of QR code) - Create QR code with the ability to save QR-Code (save QR code and resize it) - Code QR maker in English (English is supported) - Easy create QR code (creating a QR code is very easy, anyone can do it)  Install this application if you need a fast and convenient QR code creator with QR-code scanner capability.
